Configuration.Name: Proquest Dissertation Search
Configuration.Author: University of Cincinnati Libraries
Configuration.Description: Performs an Advanced title search for the LoanTitle for loans on Proquest Dissertation Abstracts.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Defines whether the search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: ClientId
Setting.Description: Defines the ClientId which can be obtained by viewing your Proquest Url.
